Ingredients

  • 4 ounces ground spicy Italian sausage
  • 4 eggs
  • ¼ cup milk
  • ½ teaspoon seasoning of your choice
  • ¼ teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 lb. shredded potatoes
  • ½ cup shredded cheese
  • green onions for topping
